message: Let's start fair, I'll take the lion's share this time, but we can negotiate more equally in the future if you accept.
You took the lion's share last time, now it's my turn. I'll give you a smaller share this time, but I'm willing to negotiate a fairer split in the future.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think a 60/40 split is fairer considering your last offer. We can keep adjusting until we find a mutually agreeable solution.
I'm willing to split it down the middle, no more negotiating, let's just get it over with.
